      private Connection conn
      The connection to the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • AuthTokenDao

      public AuthTokenDao​(Connection con)
      Creates a database access object for the AuthToken table.
      Parameters:
      con - the connection to the database.

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public String getUser​(AuthToken token)
      Performs a search for a username by AuthToken. Searches the AuthToken table of the database for a username with a matching AuthToken.
      Parameters:
      token - The AuthToken of the wanted user.
      Returns:
      The username to which the AuthToken corresponds to.

    • getName

      public String getName​(AuthToken token)
      Performs a search for a name by AuthToken. Searches the AuthToken table and the User table for the name matching the AuthToken.
      Parameters:
      token - The AuthToken of the user whose name is wanted.
      Returns:
      The name of the user the AuthToken belongs to.

    • CreateToken

      public AuthToken CreateToken​(User user)
      Creates a new AuthToken for a user. Creates a new token for a user and inserts it into the database's AuthToken table.
      Parameters:
      user - The user that needs a token.
      Returns:
      The newly created AuthToken.

    • genNewToken

      public AuthToken genNewToken​(AuthToken token)
      Re-generates an old token into a new token. Takes an old token and generates a new token for the user. Updates the database's AuthToken.
      Parameters:
      token - The old token to be replaced.
      Returns:
      The new token for the user.

    • deleteToken

      public void deleteToken​(AuthToken token)
      Deletes a user's token. Deletes the token, and removes it from the database's AuthToken table.
      Parameters:
      token - The token to be removed.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears the authToken table from the database.
